verses.text: The \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came again unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* and \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; \w Howl|strong="H3213"\w* ye, Woe \w worth|strong="H1929"\w* the \w day|strong="H3117"\w*!

For the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add is\add* \w near|strong="H7138"\w*, even the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* \w near|strong="H7138"\w*, a \w cloudy|strong="H6051"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*; it shall be the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*.

And the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* upon \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and great \w pain|strong="H2479"\w* shall be in \w Ethiopia|strong="H3568"\w*, when the \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* in \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and they shall take \w away|strong="H3947"\w* her \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w*, and her \w foundations|strong="H3247"\w* shall be broken \w down|strong="H2040"\w*.\f + \fr 30.4 \ft pain: or, fear\f*

\w Ethiopia|strong="H3568"\w*, and \w Libya|strong="H6316"\w*, and \w Lydia|strong="H3865"\w*, and all the \w mingled|strong="H6153"\w* people, and \w Chub|strong="H3552"\w*, and the \w men|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* that is in \w league|strong="H1285"\w*, shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* with them by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.\f + \fr 30.5 \ft Libya: Heb. Phut\f*\f + \fr 30.5 \ft men: Heb. children\f*

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; They also that \w uphold|strong="H5564"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*; and the \w pride|strong="H1347"\w* of her \w power|strong="H5797"\w* shall come \w down|strong="H3381"\w*: from the \w tower|strong="H4024"\w* of \w Syene|strong="H5482"\w* shall they \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* in it by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*.  +  r 30.6  t from…: or, from Migdol to Syene *

And they shall be \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w countries|strong="H0776"\w* \add that are\add* \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w*, and her \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* shall be in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \add that are\add* \w wasted|strong="H2717"\w*.

And they shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, when I have \w set|strong="H5414"\w* a \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* in \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and \add when\add* all her \w helpers|strong="H5826"\w* shall be \w destroyed|strong="H7665"\w*.\f + \fr 30.8 \ft destroyed: Heb. broken\f*

In that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* shall \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* from \w me|strong="H6440"\w* in \w ships|strong="H6716"\w* to make the \w careless|strong="H0983"\w* \w Ethiopians|strong="H3568"\w* \w afraid|strong="H2729"\w*, and great \w pain|strong="H2479"\w* shall come upon them, as in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: for, lo, it \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w*.

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; I will also make the \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* to \w cease|strong="H7673"\w* by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Nebuchadrezzar|strong="H5019"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*.

He and his \w people|strong="H5971"\w* with him, the \w terrible|strong="H6184"\w* of the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, shall be \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* to \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: and they shall \w draw|strong="H7324"\w* their \w swords|strong="H2719"\w* against \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and \w fill|strong="H4390"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* with the \w slain|strong="H2491"\w*.

And I will \w make|strong="H5414"\w* the \w rivers|strong="H2975"\w* \w dry|strong="H2724"\w*, and \w sell|strong="H4376"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7451"\w*: and I will make the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w waste|strong="H8074"\w*, and all that is \w therein|strong="H4393"\w*, by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w strangers|strong="H2114"\w*: I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \add it\add*.\f + \fr 30.12 \ft dry: Heb. drought\f*\f + \fr 30.12 \ft all…: Heb. the fulness thereof\f*

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; I will also \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* the \w idols|strong="H1544"\w*, and I will cause \add their\add* \w images|strong="H0457"\w* to \w cease|strong="H7673"\w* out of \w Noph|strong="H5297"\w*; and there shall be no more a \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: and I will \w put|strong="H5414"\w* a \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

And I will make \w Pathros|strong="H6624"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w*, and will \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* in \w Zoan|strong="H6814"\w*, and will \w execute|strong="H6213"\w* \w judgments|strong="H8201"\w* in \w No|strong="H4996"\w*.\f + \fr 30.14 \ft Zoan: or, Tanis\f*

And I will \w pour|strong="H8210"\w* my \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* upon \w Sin|strong="H5512"\w*, the \w strength|strong="H4581"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*; and I will cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* the \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w* of \w No|strong="H4996"\w*.\f + \fr 30.15 \ft Sin: or, Pelusium\f*

And I will \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* in \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: \w Sin|strong="H5512"\w* shall have \w great|strong="H2342"\w* \w pain|strong="H2342"\w*, and \w No|strong="H4996"\w* shall be rent \w asunder|strong="H1234"\w*, and \w Noph|strong="H5297"\w* \add shall have\add* \w distresses|strong="H6862"\w* \w daily|strong="H3119"\w*.

The young \w men|strong="H0970"\w* of \w Aven|strong="H0206"\w* and of \w Pi-beseth|strong="H6364"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*: and these \add cities\add* shall \w go|strong="H3212"\w* into \w captivity|strong="H7628"\w*.\f + \fr 30.17 \ft Aven: or, Heliopolis\f*\f + \fr 30.17 \ft Pi-beseth: or, Pubastum\f*

At \w Tehaphnehes|strong="H8471"\w* also the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* shall be \w darkened|strong="H2821"\w*, when I shall \w break|strong="H7665"\w* there the \w yokes|strong="H4133"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: and the \w pomp|strong="H1347"\w* of her \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* shall \w cease|strong="H7673"\w* in \w her|strong="H1931"\w*: as for her, a \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* shall \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* her, and her \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* shall \w go|strong="H3212"\w* into \w captivity|strong="H7628"\w*.\f + \fr 30.18 \ft darkened: or, restrained\f*

Thus will I \w execute|strong="H6213"\w* \w judgments|strong="H8201"\w* in \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: and they shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ And it came to pass in the \w eleventh|strong="H0259"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, in the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \add month\add*, in the \w seventh|strong="H7651"\w* \add day\add* of the \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \add that\add* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, I have \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* the \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* of \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*; and, lo, it shall not be bound \w up|strong="H2280"\w* to be \w healed|strong="H7499"\w*, to \w put|strong="H7760"\w* a \w roller|strong="H2848"\w* to \w bind|strong="H2280"\w* it, to make it \w strong|strong="H2388"\w* to \w hold|strong="H8610"\w* the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Behold, I \add am\add* against \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and will \w break|strong="H7665"\w* his \w arms|strong="H2220"\w*, the \w strong|strong="H2389"\w*, and that which was \w broken|strong="H7665"\w*; and I will cause the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* to \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* out of his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

And I will \w scatter|strong="H6327"\w* the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* among the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, and will \w disperse|strong="H2219"\w* them through the \w countries|strong="H0776"\w*.

And I will \w strengthen|strong="H2388"\w* the \w arms|strong="H2220"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* my \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: but I will \w break|strong="H7665"\w* \w Pharaoh’s|strong="H6547"\w* \w arms|strong="H2220"\w*, and he shall \w groan|strong="H5008"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him with the \w groanings|strong="H5009"\w* of a deadly \w wounded|strong="H2491"\w* \add man\add*.

But I will \w strengthen|strong="H2388"\w* the \w arms|strong="H2220"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, and the \w arms|strong="H2220"\w* of \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* shall fall \w down|strong="H5307"\w*; and they shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, when I shall \w put|strong="H5414"\w* my \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, and he shall stretch it \w out|strong="H5186"\w* upon the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

And I will \w scatter|strong="H6327"\w* the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* among the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, and \w disperse|strong="H2219"\w* them among the \w countries|strong="H0776"\w*; and they shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
